title: Roblox The Forge codes
description: The Forge is a brand new Roblox experience, which should be great for anyone out there yearning for the mines. Dive below the surface in this subterranean stunt, and uncover ore to craft weapons, armor, and much more. If you’re one of the many miners out there hurling your pickaxe at The Forge, then you will absolutely want to learn all about the latest The Forge codes, which you can find below. Table of Contents [hide] All The Forge CodesExpired codes All The Forge Codes These are all the currently active The Forge codes: FREESPINS - 8 Rerolls and 1 Luck Totem Expired codes Here are all expired The Forge codes: Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: The Mystery Of The Game Awards Monolith Appears To Have Been Spoiled By A Trademark Filing
description: It's been a busy week for industry speculation after Geoff Keighley started posting about a mysterious, glowing monolith in the middle of the California desert, which was later moved into Los Angeles. Now, it appears the monolith's mystery might have just been solved through a trademark filing. Rumors that the monolith was erected to tease new Diablo 4 content, Elder Scrolls 6, God of War, or Lords of the Fallen 2 were all shot down by people in the know. While others speculated that it still could be related to The Elder Scrolls Online, or a new FromSoft game, it appears most likely that the statue is promoting a new Divinity title from Larian. A trio of trademark filings were spotted up by MP1st, including a new Divinity logo and a symbol that looks suspiciously like the glowing one on Geoff Keighley's monolith. The familiar-looking trademarks come after Larian's publishing director said there aren't currently any plans for a Divinity: Original Sin 3, meaning the upcoming title may be a new Divinity game outside of the Original Sin prequel series. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Roblox The Forge Tier List - Best Weapon, Pickaxe, and Race
description: With the latest Roblox craze, The Forge, there is just so much content to dig into that it’s tough to know where to begin. Thankfully, we’re here to mark a big X on the right spot for you, breaking down the best of the best when it comes to weapons and races in this underground escapade. So if you’re yearning to explore further in the mine, then our tier lists covering weapons, pickaxes, and races will help. The Forge Weapon Tier List As you explore the depths of The Forge, it is very important to pack a formidable weapon, so you can wipe out enemies and grab yourself even more exclusive ore. Ore what? Well, we wouldn’t like to say. So avoid wiping out and waking up on the surface, with our The Forge weapon tier list below: Tier The Forge Weapon S Comically Large Spoon, Crusader Sword, Double Battle Axe, Dragon Slayer, Scythe, Skull Crusher, A Boxing Gloves, Cutlass, Chaos, Great Sword, Hammer, Relevator, Tachi B Falchion Sword, Gladius Daggers, Iron Hand, Uchigatana C Dagger, Falchion Knife, Hook, Rapier The Forge Pickaxe Tier List Weapons are just half the battle in The Forge, as when you chip away at the walls, you will need a strong pickaxe if you hope to mine those rare ores. So, get ready to gear up and grab some of the finest minerals this side of the surface with our The Forge pickaxe tier list, below: Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Cyberpunk Is Getting An Official Physical Trading Card Game In Collaboration With CD Projekt Red
description: The Cyberpunk series is getting an official physical trading card game as part of a new collaboration between CD Projekt Red and TCG newcomers WeirdCo. The game will feature characters from across Cyberpunk 2077 and the anime series Edgerunners, while also drawing from the extended Cyberpunk universe to make a TCG that's faithful to the franchise's origins. IGN reported revealed the upcoming project in an interview with key players from both CD Projekt Red and WeirdCo, who share a mutual passion for bringing Cyberpunk to the TCG space--which will also mark CD Projekt Red's first physical TCG. "Every one of us at WeirdCo loves the Cyberpunk universe, and we built the TCG bit by bit on this foundation," WeirdCo co-founder Elliot Cook said, revealing that the team looked not only to 2077 and Edgerunners for inspiration, but also the Dark Horse comic series. "At each step we analyzed every little detail, constantly asking ourselves: 'How do we make this more authentic to Cyberpunk?'" Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Sigourney Weaver In Talks To Join Tomb Raider TV Show - Report
description: Amazon's live action Tomb Raider TV show finally seems to be going ahead after a few false starts, with Game of Thrones alum Sophie Turner in the lead role. Now, reports suggest sci-fi legend Sigourney Weaver is up for a role in the TV adaptation. Deadline reports that Weaver is circling a role in the upcoming Tomb Raider TV show, though a deal has not yet been closed. It's unknown what role she would play if cast. Sigourney Weaver has played a part in a number of iconic film franchises, from her breakout role in the Alien series to her more recent appearances in James Cameron's Avatar films--with the latest, Avatar: Fire And Ash, releasing in cinemas on December 19. Weaver is also set to appear in next year's Star Wars: The Mandalorian & Grogu. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Lego Super Mario Piranha Plant Is Still On Sale For An Incredible Price This Week
description: Lego Super Mario Piranha Plant (540 Pieces) $36 (was $60) See at Amazon See at Walmart See at Target See at Best Buy Lego's awesome 540-piece Piranha Plant building set is on sale for only $36 (was $60) at Amazon, Walmart, and Target. We expected the 40% discount on this Lego Super Mario display model to disappear on Monday, but it's actually available at more retailers than before. Best Buy featured the Piranha Plant in its weekend doorbuster sale, and Amazon quickly matched the deal. But while Best Buy indeed raised the price back to $60 when the sale ended, Amazon's deal remained available and has since been joined by matching deals at Walmart and Target. It's unclear when the discount will expire at these retailers; Target mentions December 10 on its store page, but end dates at Target aren't always reliable. You can get free shipping at all three retailers, and the Piranha Plant will arrive with plenty of time to spare before Christmas. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: The Ring 4K Blu-Ray Box Set Is Only $39 At Amazon
description: The Ring Collection on 4K Blu-ray $39 (was $90) | All-time low See at Amazon The Ring Limited Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $19 (was $35) | All-time low See at Amazon Ringu 4-Film Collection: Special Edition (Blu-ray) $46.69 (was $100) | All-time low See at Amazon Fans of horror movies revolving around cursed VHS tapes and half-human, half-demon ghosts who crawl out of televisions can score a fantastic deal on The Ring Collection. Released last year with a $90 retail price, the three-film 4K Blu-ray box set is on sale for only $39 at Amazon. This is a new all-time low for The Ring Collection, which you'll need if you want to watch The Ring 2 and Rings on 4K Blu-ray; neither sequel has received a standalone 4K release. If you only want the first (and best) film in the series, The Ring Limited Edition Steelbook is discounted to only $19 (was $35), which is the lowest price yet and actually slightly cheaper than the standard edition 4K Blu-ray ($20.29). And if you're interested in comparing the Hollywood version of The Ring to the original Japanese film, Arrow Video's 4K Blu-ray restoration of Ringu is available for $35 (was $50). Alternatively, the Ringu 4-Film Collection is discounted to $46.69, which is an all-time low for this Blu-ray box set. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Gibson SG Wireless Guitar Controller For PS5 Launches This Month
description: CRKD Gibson SG Wireless Guitar Controller (PS5, PS4, PC) $135 | Releases December 19 Preorder at Amazon Amazon has opened preorders for CRKD's next Gibson Guitar Controller. The Gibson SG 20th Anniversary Edition retails for $135 and is slated to launch December 19. Notably, this is the first wireless guitar controller in CRKD's catalog licensed by PlayStation. The Gibson SG syncs wirelessly to PS5, PS4, PS3, and PC via a 2.4GHz dongle. The multiplatform version of CRKD's Gibson Les Paul Guitar Controller is limited to a wired connection on PS5 and PS4, so the Gibson SG is likely the better option for Fortnite Festival and Rock Band 4 players on PlayStation. PS5 players now have two officially licensed wireless guitar controllers to choose from. The other is the PDP Riffmaster, which is still on sale for its $110 (was $150) Black Friday price. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: One Of 2025's Weirdest Films Comes To 4K Blu-Tay This Month
description: Bugonia Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K) $38 | Releases December 23 See at Amazon See at Walmart Bugonia Standard Edition $33 | Releases December 23 See at Amazon See at Walmart Between the usual superhero action and sleeper hits at the box office, one of the more unusual films released this year was Bugonia. The new thriller from director Yorgos Lanthimos and producer Emma Stone--who also stars in the film alongside Jesse Plemons--wasn't a box office hit, but it's certainly an unforgettable movie. If you missed it when it came out, you can preorder it now ahead of its December 23 release, with options for a limited-edition 4K Blu-ray, standard 4K Blu-ray, standard Blu-ray, and DVD. Bugonia Collector's Edition Steelbook (4K) $38 | Releases December 23 The Collector's Edition steelbook cover uses Bugonia's theatrical posters for its exterior and interior artwork, which hint at the film's weird, conspiratorial tone. Like other Blu-ray releases, you'll get the film on a 4K Blu-ray disc, a standard Blu-ray disc, and a digital streaming code to watch it online. For bonus features, the Blu-ray includes a documentary on the making of Bugonia, interviews with the cast and crew, behind-the-scenes footage, and more. Bugonia bonus materials The Birth and the Bees: The making of Bugonia Interviews with Emma Stone, Jesse Plemons, and the rest of the cast and crew Behind-the-scenes footage featuring the sets, music, and cinematography See at Amazon See at Walmart Bugonia Standard Edition $33 | Releases December 23 The Bugonia standard edition features different cover art and a standard movie case, but includes the same special features as the steelbook edition. It's available to preorder in 4K, Blu-ray, and DVD formats at Amazon and Walmart, all of which launch on December 23. Bugonia Standard Edition Preorders: 4K -- $33 | Also at Walmart | Releases December 23 Blu-ray -- $31 | Also at Walmart | Releases December 23 DVD -- $18 | Also at Walmart | Releases December 23 See at Amazon See at Walmart Bugonia Collector's Edition Steelbook 4K Blu-rayBugonia is an adaptation of the 2003 South Korean sci-fi comedy film Save the Green Planet. The film follows two conspiracy-obsessed cousins (Plemons and Aidan Dobis) who are convinced that the CEO of a powerful company (Stone) is actually an alien in disguise, hellbent on wiping out humanity. After kidnapping and trapping her in their basement, the trio engages in a battle of wits, interrogation, and torture, with the film becoming increasingly unpredictable as it races towards its conclusion. While it wasn't a box-office hit, Bugonia did earn relatively high praise from critics and audiences alike thanks to the standout performances of the cast and its wild plot twists. For more Blu-ray deals, you can check out various specials right now. The Hobbit Trilogy on 4K Blu-ray has gotten a big discount, and the box set for the A Better Tomorrow Trilogy has also gotten a substantial price cut. Continue Reading at GameSpot

title: Check Out Wicked: For Good Limited-Edition 4K Blu-Rays
description: Wicked: For Good Gift Set $230 | Release date TBD See at Amazon Wicked: For Good Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $38 | Release date TBD See at Walmart Wicked: For Good Standard Edition $40.49 | Release date TBD See at Amazon (4K) See at Amazon (Blu-ray) See at Amazon (DVD) Wicked: For Good is coming to Blu-ray after it finishes its box office run, and fans can look forward to multiple limited-edition versions, along with standard Blu-ray and DVD versions, all of which are available to preorder now. The most extravagant release is the Amazon-exclusive Wicked: For Good Gift Set, available for $230, which includes the film on 4K Blu-ray and a selection of exclusive collectibles. Walmart also has its own exclusive Wicked: For Good Steelbook Edition 4K Blu-ray--though this one is much more affordable at $38. You can check out all the Wicked: For Good Blu-ray preorders below--just note that there are no release dates announced yet. Nevertheless, ordering ahead of time locks you in for Amazon and Walmart's preorder price guarantees. Wicked: For Good Gift Set $230 | Release date TBD The Wicked: For Good Gift Set includes the film on 4K Blu-ray with exclusive packaging. The cover features the witches Elphaba and Glinda standing opposite each other on the Yellow Brick Road, and on the inside, you'll find that motif repeated with promotional artwork from the film. The gift set also comes with a collectible gold Emerald City statuette and certificate of authenticity, all bundled up inside of an Emerald City-inspired pink box with gold metal highlights. At the time of writing, special features for the Blu-ray release have not been revealed yet, but if the first Wicked movie is any indication, you can likely expect featurettes, interviews, deleted scenes, and a sing-along mode so that you can take part in the musical. This version includes a standard Blu-ray copy of the film and a digital streaming code. See at Amazon Wicked: For Good Limited-Edition Steelbook (4K Blu-ray) $38 | Release date TBD Exclusive to Walmart, the Wicked: For Good Limited-Edition Steelbook 4K Blu-ray features images from Wicked: For Good's promotional materials on the front and back, while the inside of the case features an aerial view of Oz and the Emerald City. This version includes a 4K UHD, standard Blu-ray, and digital streaming copies of the film. See at Walmart Wicked: For Good Standard Edition $40.49 | Release date TBD Wicked: For Good will also be available in a standard edition that includes the movie and special features. Final artwork for the cover has not yet been revealed. Preorders are available for the 4K UHD, standard Blu-ray, and DVD versions. Wicked: For Good Standard Edition Preorders: 4K -- $40.49 Blu-ray -- $25 DVD -- $20 See at Amazon (4K) See at Amazon (Blu-ray) See at Amazon (DVD) Set after the events of the previous film, Wicked: For Good concludes the untold story of the witches of Oz. Elphaba and Glinda have now drifted apart and live drastically different lives. Elphaba has been forced into exile after being demonized as The Wicked Witch of the West, but she's still focused on her mission to expose the Wonderful Wizard of Oz. Meanwhile, Glinda has become a glamorous symbol of Goodness and is basking in the limelight, but both witches must eventually unite and reconcile their differences for the greater good of Oz. Wicked limited-edition steelbook Blu-rayIf you haven't seen it yet, the first Wicked movie is also available on 4K Blu-ray. Amazon has a fresh stock of the 4K steelbook edition, and both editions come with theatrical and sing-along versions of the film, deleted scenes, and behind-the-scenes documentaries. Continue Reading at GameSpot
